title: Jack Dorsey-Backed Ocean Bitcoin Mining Pool Introduces Block Template Options
description: Ocean, a Bitcoin mining pool backed by Jack Dorsey, has introduced block template options to allow individual miners to decide which transactions will be included in the next block. title: Nigeria’s Top Banks Collaborate on New cNGN Stablecoin
description: Principal Nigerian banks have joined forces to create the cNGN stablecoin, a new digital currency set to revolutionize the financial landscape in Nigeria. title: Humane AI Pin to Commence Shipping in March 2024 for Priority Orders
description: Humane, the tech company known for its innovative AI Pin wearable, has officially announced that it will commence shipping in March 2024. title: Paxos Receives Regulatory Nod from NYDFS to Offer USDP on Solana
description:
Paxos acquires regulatory nod from the NY DFS for its expansion to Solana. The platform will issue Pax Dollar on Solana on January 17, 2024. Solana’s co-founder, Raj Gokal, asserts the alliance envisions building a financially empowering future.
